title: TFSA Basics
description: The most flexible savings tool in Canada.

content.title: Tax-Free Growth
content.text: In a Tax-Free Savings Account (TFSA), you don't pay any tax on the interest or investment growth you earn. You can withdraw the money at any time for any reason without penalty.

quiz.question: What happens to your unused TFSA contribution room at the end of the year?
options: It carries forward to the next year
You have to pay a fine
It is converted to RRSP room
quiz.explanation: Unused TFSA room carries forward indefinitely, allowing you to catch up in future years.
